ygData.subject: RE: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you!   That was my point exactly.  I purposefully made generalized statements about the cleric class to match the idiotic ones that was made about
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you! That was my point exactly. I purposefully made generalized
statements about the cleric class to match the idiotic ones that was made
about warriors. If you don't like playing your warrior, fine don't play
him. But don't come to the warrior mailing list and start telling us how
better your cleric is than your warrior.

Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"

> ----------
> From: Jynxx[SMTP:jynxx@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 12:21 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>
> From: "Jynxx" <jynxx@...>
>
> Ok...clerics heal. Blah blah blah....who cares? This is a board for
> WARRIORS, not clerics. I am sorry if I am offending anyone by saying this,
> but please keep your cleric opinions to yourselves. If I wanted to hear
> about the virtues of playing a cleric vs. playing a warrior I would have
> joined a cleric board. Last time I looked the list was called
> 'Warriors_eq'
> and had nothing to do with Clerics. If you have fun playing a cleric out
> there, be down...have all the fun you want. Just don't tell me that I
> don't
> do anything because I am a warrior because even with all your heals you
> couldn't be half as vital in a group as I am. Without a warrior to save
> your
> arse from getting hit by that 31st level mob you'd be dead in 7 seconds
> flat...well maybe 10 if you got a heal in there. Bottom line: Don't come
> to
> my board telling me I suck, cause it's gonna tick me (and a lot of other
> GOOD warriors) off really bad.
>
> Tyveris,
> Blue Samurai of the Butterfly Rank
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Clancy <tcashio3@...>
> To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 10:39 AM
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Why I don't play a Warrior
>
>
> > From: "Clancy" <tcashio3@...>
> >
> > Umm... whoever says this about clerics is stupid as hell
> >
> > At lvl 31 I group consistantly with a cleric. This class is amazing.
> If
> > you think all they do is heal, you are very very wrong. Their dd's do
> stun
> > (amazing for rogues) and they can heal better than any other class. I
> want
> > to see your two druids heal you to full from 1 bar of life
> >
> > Also if all you fight is yellows and reds you need to rethink your
> leveling
> > process. Whites and blues are excellent to fight if you are in groups
> that
> > handle large numbers well. Before you say all clerics do is heal, play
> one,
> > or play with a good one.
> >
> >
